actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

actions.subcommittee: the Civil Service and Agency Organization
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on the Civil Service and Agency Organization.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil Service and Agency Organization

official_title: To provide wage parity for certain Department of Defense prevailing rate employees in Georgia.

summary.text: Requires the wage schedules and rates applicable to prevailing rate employees of the Department of Defense in the Macon, Georgia, wage area to be the same as the schedules and rates applicable to such employees in the Atlanta, Georgia, wage area.

titles.title: To provide wage parity for certain Department of Defense prevailing rate employees in Georgia.
